docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Add a Heading ¶ Add texts to test. Test GitLab IO ¶ Your documentation should shortly appear at https://<username>.gitlab.io/notes/test_mkdocs/
